import React from 'react' import { shape, string } from 'prop-types' import { STATUS, PRIORITY } from '../../utils/constants' import { createDropDown } from '../../utils/utils' const namespace = 'taskdata' const TaskData = ({ data: { title, priority, status, description } }) => { return (

Prioridad:

Estado:

Titulo: {title}

Descripcion
{description}

) } TaskData.propTypes = { data: shape({ title: string.isRequired, priority: string.isRequired, status: string.isRequired, description: string.isRequired }).isRequired } export default TaskData
